title: Crazy in Love
lyrics:
Nan meongcheonghae neo bakk-e moleuneun babo
Nan eotteohge haeyadoelleonji moleugess-eo nado
I don't wanna say no more
Amugeosdo moleugess-eo ijen deo
Geujeo nal jabgo ikkeul-eojwo
Neo eobs-in ap-i an boineun i eodum sog



Salanghae (neol) salanghae (deo)



I think I’m crazy

U know that I’m crazy

Deo isang hemaeigo sipji anh-a

You should go and grab me and take me

Take it nae modeun geol da take it

Everything baby you will gonna make it

Kkum-eul kkumyeon niga maeil nae ap-e

Babo gatdeus-i nan jigeum neoman saeng-gaghae



Babolago malhaedo joh-a

Michyeossdago malhaedo sang-gwan-eobs-eo

Kkajis jajonsim pil-yo eobs-eo



Neo animyeon geu nugudo wonhaji anh-eunikka



Yes I’m in crazy love

Neohante michin geo maj-a

Neo bakk-e anboyeo

I’m crazy in love

Neolamyeon michyeodo joh-a

Halu jong-il ni saeng-gagppun-iya

Salang-e michyeoss-eunikka

Neo animyeon andoenikka

I’m crazy in love

Yes I’m in crazy love

Neohante michyeoss-eunikka



Eonjenga niga malhaessji salanghamyeonseo

Wae heeojineunji moleugessdago

Ulin an heeojil geolago

Don’t lemme say goodbye Girl

Lemme love you right

Ibsul kkeut-e maedallin mal heeojijaneun

Geu malman haji mal-ajwo



Babolago malhaedo joh-a

Michyeossdago malhaedo sang-gwan-eobs-eo

Kkajis jajonsim pil-yo eobs-eo



Neo animyeon geu nugudo wonhaji anh-eunikka



Yes I’m in crazy love

Neohante michin geo maj-a

Neo bakk-e anboyeo

I’m crazy in love

Neolamyeon michyeodo joh-a

Halu jong-il ni saeng-gagppun-iya

Salang-e michyeoss-eunikka

Neo animyeon andoenikka

I’m crazy in love

Yes I’m in crazy love

Neohante michyeoss-eunikka



Gil ilh-eun gibun-iya eolin aecheoleom

I’m lost without you

I’m lost without you girl

Michyeossdago malhaedo neo eobs-ineun andwae



Yes I’m in crazy love

Neohante michin geo maj-a

Neo bakk-e anboyeo

I’m crazy in love

Neolamyeon michyeodo joh-a

Halu jong-il ni saeng-gagppun-iya

Salang-e michyeoss-eunikka

Neo animyeon andoenikka

I’m crazy in love

Yes I’m in crazy love
